      # File railties/lib/rails/application/railties.rb, line 23
23:       def plugins
24:         @plugins ||= begin
25:           plugin_names = (@config.plugins || [:all]).map { |p| p.to_sym }
26:           Plugin.all(plugin_names, @config.paths.vendor.plugins)
27:         end
28:       end
